meanings.definition: A hypothetical permanent change in the brain accounting for the existence of memory; a memory trace.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the engram to understand how memories are stored in the brain.
meanings.sent2: She was trying to recall the engram of her first day at school.
meanings.sent3: The engram in his brain seemed to have a mind of its own, popping up memories at random times.
meanings.sent4: Her engram was like a hidden treasure chest, full of precious memories waiting to be unlocked.
meanings.sent5: The engram was like a tiny seed planted in his mind, growing into a tree of memories over time.

meanings.definition: A lasting biological change in the brain that results from experience.
meanings.sent1: The engram formed in his brain after the thrilling rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent2: Her engram of the accident made her more cautious while driving.
meanings.sent3: The engram in his brain was like a souvenir from his adventurous experiences.
meanings.sent4: The engram was a silent witness to all the moments that shaped her life.
meanings.sent5: The engram was a colorful mosaic of all the experiences that made up his life story.
